/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise serene setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This image captures the essence of a peaceful day in Beijing, where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
